name: places/ChIJr-6eTAdZwokR_D7W33hcA1M
formattedAddress: 232 Madison Ave Suite 1002, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 232 Madison Ave Suite 1002, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text:
The Sorrentino Media team is five star fabulous! I worked with Michael and his team in 2019 to create my news reel (from scratch).  I did not have news clips to compete with seasoned anchors and reporters.  Once I had my stories organized, we shot on location as well as in the studio.  The Sorrentino team delivered the final sizzle reel which allowed me to enter the news market with confidence!

I reached out to Michael and his team in July of 2023 while launching my first children's book and needed to record an audio version for the e-book narration.  They knew exactly which files I would need, and we got it done with a fast turnaround.

The foundation for producing great work is feeling comfortable, disarmed, and relaxed.  This work can be overwhelming and naturally brings up anxiety when you have the camera on you are asked to read material while being recorded. Michael and his team are mindful of this and make sure that you feel comfortable and have what you need to take the stage, whether it's on-air or VO work.

The location of the studio is super convenient to get to from anywhere in the city!  They offer a fantastic green room with delicious snacks, coffee, tea, and beverage options! You immediately feel at home when the staff greets you!  The entire team is friendly, professional, warm, approachable--simply, THE DREAM TEAM!!!  Sorrentino Media is a MUST for your video/audio production needs!

originalText.text: The Sorrentino Media team’s strength is listening to the needs of their clients and then leveraging their tremendous expertise and skill to deliver a product that goes beyond what we even envisioned possible. They have an infectious enthusiasm for everything they do and are committed to getting things right, no matter what it takes. Every project we have executed with them has delivered the ROI we were looking to achieve and has been incredibly well received by both internal and external audiences. We appreciate their dedication, positive attitude and amazing work and look forward to working with them again on future projects.

text.text: The Sorrentino Media team’s strength is listening to the needs of their clients and then leveraging their tremendous expertise and skill to deliver a product that goes beyond what we even envisioned possible. They have an infectious enthusiasm for everything they do and are committed to getting things right, no matter what it takes. Every project we have executed with them has delivered the ROI we were looking to achieve and has been incredibly well received by both internal and external audiences. We appreciate their dedication, positive attitude and amazing work and look forward to working with them again on future projects.

originalText.text:
I have been working with Sorrentino Media for 5 years.  Our relationship began when Mike and his team took office space in our corporate office.  Since then I have marveled at the growth of his company as he took more and more space to accommodate his need for two studios, a control room and studio support space.

As Sorrentino Media grew the office relationship evolved into NEP referring clients of ours needing smaller studios to his studios.  That enabled NEP to better service its many clients with many of them coming from outside the US and needing exactly what his company offered.

Mike and his team are true professionals and it has been a delight and pleasure watching his company grow the past 5 years.  To that, I know that when I refer our clients to Sorrentino Media, his work will positively reflect back on NEP as a company.  It is a true win-win scenario that has extended from a business relationship to also being friends.

I have the utmost respect for what Mike has achieved and I am happy to have helped him succeed.

originalText.text: The Sorrentino Media team excels at developing content that exceeds your goals. Every member of their team brings their A game to help tell your story in the most meaningful way.

originalText.text: Working with the Sorrentino Team is an absolute pleasure! They are beyond accommodating and have helped make the NYC Imagine Awards an amazing experience for all of our finalists!
